Keywords: Battleworld: Other , Fantastic Four , Latveria , Runaways , Scientist
Real Name: Valeria Richards
Special Powers
HUNTING ANOMALIES FROM OTHER WORLDS: FREE: Roll a d6 and place Valeria Von Doom up to that many squares away. // During your opponentï¿½s turn, when an opposing character is placed within 4 squares and line of fire, after resolutions deal them 1 penetrating damage.
FINDING OUT THE TRUTH ABOUT FATHER: When a friendly character KO's an opposing character of lower points than them, give Valeria Von Doom an action token that does not deal pushing damage.
HEAD OF THE INSTITUTE FOR GIFTED YOUTHS: Leadership, Perplex. When Valeria Von Doom uses Leadership and succeeds, choose a friendly character within 4 squares and line of fire. That character can use Outwit until your next turn.

Comments
May 16, 2021
Goop
Mostly just a cheap perplex/leadership and an occasional outwit. She's good for only 30pts but honestly i think i'd rather run the uncommon one for 10pts more. Seems like the kind of piece to keep on your sideline and swap in with Invisible woman if you are gonna face some thing with a lot of placement affects. (retaliators, tks, etc).
July 16, 2020
flashpool88
Definitely great support for Scientist teams. Leadership, Perplex piece that teleports around and has the potential to restrict retaliation with good placement. Giving Outwit potentially is icing.
